video.title: The Celebrity Plastic Surgeons of Beverly Hills
video.synopsis: In a town built on good looks, the elite plastic surgeons of Beverly Hills put their A-list patients under the knife so they can look their best.

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Rey gives a tae kwon do classmate a butt lift. A client with a heart-wrenching past gets new teeth from Dr. Sands. The doctors visit a racetrack.
episodes.title: Meet The Doctors

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Diamond performs nose jobs on a pair of sisters and a facial rejuvenation on their mom. Dr. Rey's wife finds him posing with a supermodel patient.
episodes.title: Coming Up Roses

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Amron performs full-body liposuction, while Dr. Ziering helps a woman with thinning eyebrows. Later, Dr. Amron goes for a disastrous glider ride.
episodes.title: To Glide Or Not To Glide

episodes.synopsis: The aftermath of Dr. Amron's glider disaster is revealed. Meanwhile, Dr. Diamond performs a face-lift on a woman unhappy with how tired she looks.
episodes.title: Crash Landing

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Sands gives a woman a new smile, and later consults a rabbi for help. Dr. Diamond learns his celebrity face-lift patient is having medical issues.
episodes.title: A Very Celebrity Facelift

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Amron reduces a woman's "cankles" with liposuction. An aspiring actor seeks a nose job from Dr. Diamond. Dr. Rey grills his daughter's new beau.
episodes.title: Sydney Rey Has A Boyfriend

episodes.synopsis: Hayley opens up to the other doctors' wives. Dr. Sands works on a cancer patient. Dr. Diamond and Dr. Rey team up to perform a nose and chin implant.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Photoshop

episodes.synopsis: After solving a housekeeping crisis, Dr. Rey performs a female rejuvenation. Dr. Amron plans a complex liposuction for a patient with large calves.
episodes.title: I Have A Thigh Problem

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Ziering collaborates with another hair restoration expert, Dr. Rogers, whom he later brings to Dr. Rey's house, unaware that she's Dr. Rey's ex.
episodes.title: Meeting The Ex

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Ziering helps a celebrity assistant reverse the hair loss she's kept hidden from everyone. Dr. Sands tries to watch his own kids without any help.
episodes.title: Hair Devastation

episodes.synopsis: After an indoor skydiving session with Dr. Diamond, Dr. Amron repairs a botched liposuction, while Dr. Sands fixes teeth damaged from eating lemons.
episodes.title: I Believe I Can Fly

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Rey revitalizes a new mom's breasts. A robot helps Dr. Ziering with a hair restoration surgery. Dr. Sands's latest splurge lands him in hot water.
episodes.title: Robots Can Operate, Too

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Amron tackles a difficult case of lipoedema. Dr. Diamond takes on a complex rhinoplasty revision. Dr. Sands worries about Dr. Rey's front teeth.
episodes.title: Thigh’ve Got A Problem

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Ziering helps a famous actor with his thinning hair. A model gets new breasts from Dr. Rey. Dr. Diamond hires a celebrity dog trainer for his pup.
episodes.title: The Doctor And The Dog Trainer

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Rey makes a life-changing decision that will affect his family and career. Dr. Amron performs at a party, where Hayley reveals her husband's news.
episodes.title: Marital Bliss Or Not?
